title: os: System crash on Mac OS X after double kill
body:
by **ben.johnson@jadedpixel.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. http://play.golang.org/p/sRp01Ndcad

What is the expected output?

An error saying that the process has already been killed.


What do you see instead?

Hard system crash. My screen on my Macbook Pro goes gray and I can't do anything.


Which operating system are you using?

Mac 10.8.5


Which version are you using?  (run 'go version' or 'gccgo --version')

go version go1.2 darwin/amd64


Please provide any additional information below.
